name: The Timeless Winter
description:
When a corrupt king comes to power Smiley tries to warn the town. However, he is exiled for crimes against the crown. Years later he returns to thaw the snow that blinds the people and reveal the truth of the king

WASD to move

Left Ctrl to sprint

Shift to pass time

Space to jump

Q to transform

E to interact

Left Mouse to attack

Right Mouse to special attack

Mouse to look around
